thread.title: Fmr Obama Official Reveals Last-Minute Rush to Spy on Trump
thread.title_full: Fmr Obama Official Reveals Last-Minute Rush to Spy on Trump

author: Davis
title: Fmr Obama Official Reveals Last-Minute Rush to Spy on Trump
text:
WATCH: Media Freaks After Spicer Tells Female Reporter How to Behave During Press Briefing 
This intelligence effort might explain House Intelligence Committee Chairman Devin Nunes’ bombshell revelation that Trump transition officials were caught in incidental surveillance operations , and their names potentially illegally unmasked. 
“I had a fear that somehow that information would disappear with the senior (Obama) people who left, so it would be hidden away in the bureaucracy … that the Trump folks — if they found out how we knew what we knew about … the Trump staff dealing with Russians — that they would try to compromise those sources and methods, meaning we no longer have access to that intelligence,” Farkas told Brzezinski. 
Farkas didn’t elaborate on how exactly she and her colleagues went about collecting this intelligence, leading to the possibility that the methods they used weren’t strictly legal. Advertisement - story continues below 
Check out the interview here. Farkas’ admission comes about the 4:50 mark. 
Whatever the case, it is clear that Obama administration officials were desperate to do whatever they could to sink Trump’s presidency before it even got off the ground. 
Despite all of their efforts, Trump is still the president, and there has been absolutely no evidence linking him in any way to Russian campaign interference. Advertisement - story continues below
